sourcesContent:
Chat com IA

{{ aviso }}
Resposta: {{ resposta }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ChatGptService } from './chat-gpt.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chat-gpt', templateUrl: './chat-gpt.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chat-gpt.component.css'] }) export class ChatGptComponent implements OnInit { prompt: string = ''; resposta: string = ''; selectedAI: string = 'GPT'; availableAIs: string[] = ['GPT', 'Gemini', 'DeepSeek']; loading: boolean = false; aviso: string = ''; constructor(private chatService: ChatGptService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} enviarPrompt(): void { if (!this.prompt) return; this.loading = true; this.aviso = ''; this.chatService.sendPrompt(this.prompt, this.selectedAI).subscribe({ next: (res: any) => { this.resposta = res.resposta; this.loading = false; }, error: (err: any) => { console.error('❌ Erro no prompt:', err); this.aviso = err.error?.error || 'Ocorreu um erro ao processar sua solicitação'; this.loading = false; } }); } }
